video.title: Crossing Lines
video.synopsis: In pursuit of justice, the International Criminal Court's special crime unit hunts down lawbreakers whose offenses cross borders in Europe.

episodes.synopsis: A multinational police team is created to combat Europe's rising cross-border crimes. And their first case is an invisible cross-border killer.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The team has solid evidence about the killer, and even a name, but the clock is ticking: He's abducted one of their own.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The ICC team has gained recognition and cross-border authority. Now, they must track down a gang of thieves who use radioactive polonium as a weapon.
episodes.title: The Termination

episodes.synopsis: An abandoned car in Poland and a body found in Germany involve the team in a fight club. The only way to crack it is to risk becoming its victims.
episodes.title: Long-Haul Predators

episodes.synopsis: The ICC team must solve the latest in a chain of deadly kidnappings before the criminals not only kill their victim but endanger Dorn's life as well.
episodes.title: Special Ops: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Maxim Marianski is still in the hands of his kidnappers as Louis suspects Russian mobster Dimitrov is involved.
episodes.title: Special Ops: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A deadly bank robbery in the Hague traps one of the ICC team members inside with a gang of killers and threatens to ensnare another in a jailbreak.
episodes.title: The Animals

episodes.synopsis: The ICC team sets out to stop a revenge-fueled cross-border killing spree sparked by the theft of drugs and cash from an Italian crime lord.
episodes.title: Desperation & Desperados

episodes.synopsis: Anne-Marie is missing, Sebastian's computer has been hacked, Hickman is framed for murder: The bad guys are somehow staying a step ahead of the team.
episodes.title: New Scars / Old Wounds: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Hickman's nemesis Genovese in handcuffs, things are looking up for the team. Then Louis disappears, and Dimitrov presents a deadly ultimatum.
episodes.title: New Scars / Old Wounds: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Still reeling from the shock of losing Anne-Marie, one of their own, the team now has only 24 hours to find and rescue Louis and Rebecca.
episodes.title: The Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Hickman’s former New York partner, Det. Amanda Andrews, is in the middle of a dangerous rescue of kidnapped young women -- a trap set by Genovese.
episodes.title: The Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: A skilled sniper with a serious political grudge cleverly uses the team to get to his real goal: an international platform for his extremist demands.
episodes.title: The Kill Zone

episodes.synopsis: After bullying text messages are sent to four teens, prompting three to commit suicide, the team races to find the fourth victim before it's too late.
episodes.title: Everybody Will Know

episodes.synopsis: A series of vicious home invasions in Belgium and Germany have escalated in violence, and the team apply their unique talents to assess the evidence.
episodes.title: Home is where the Heart is

episodes.synopsis: As Eva goes undercover to get info on a human trafficking gang, Hickman and Amanda work a sting on Genovese, who has valuable bargaining information.
episodes.title: Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Miles Lennon contacts Dorn about similarities between a news story from Prague and his previous cases involving dead old men and greedy young brides.
episodes.title: The Velvet Glove

episodes.synopsis: Lennon asks for the help of the ICC team in solving a new case involving a tainted batch of drugs that is killing dozens of people across London.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: After the attempted kidnapping of a movie star and long-term friend of Dorn's, the team investigates similar murders of other film professionals.
episodes.title: Truth and Consequences

episodes.synopsis: When a body found in Italy is determined by a journalist to be the work of a serial killer, the team works with the journalist to pinpoint a motive.
episodes.title: The Long Way Home

episodes.synopsis: Noticing similarities between prison breaks in Lille and Prague, the team visits the aftermaths and determines that the breakouts were coordinated.
episodes.title: The Team: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The team, at first baffled by the gang’s tactics, begins to put the pieces together and soon realizes the prison psychiatrist is in on the breakout.
episodes.title: The Team: Part 2
